column1: Sakākā (Arabic: سَكَاكَا‎) is a city in northwestern Saudi Arabia which is the capital of Al Jawf Province. It is located just to the north of the An Nafud desert. Sakakah had a population of 242
Sakakah is an oasis town on an ancient caravan route across the Arabian peninsula.
